name: 重塑呐喊的权利 Rebuilding the Rights of Scream
name_original: 重塑呐喊的权利 Rebuilding the Rights of Scream
description:
婴儿的啼哭是他们的本能，但成年人却常常因为太记得不要啼哭而忘记了呐喊。在《重塑呐喊的权利》中，我希望用呐喊这个动作本身去带来精神的疗愈、让玩家用气息重新链接他们的身体与精神。

游戏的灵感来源于拉康的父性秩序对人原初声音的压抑。我们可以从很多影视、音乐作品中看到这一题材。但游戏具有这样一种力量，它将媒介的顺序颠倒过来，让人去面对一个新的本体论架构，跨越符号界秩序，从而回到自己的身体里去、解放精神上的压力。 本游戏是一个声音控制游戏，玩家需要去把握喊叫的音量大小、频率、换气机会

This game is a sound control game, players needs to challenge their volume of shouting size, frequency and catch the chance of breath changing.

Babies cry instinctively, but adults often forget to scream because they remember too much not to cry.

In this work, I hope to use the act of screaming to bring spiritual healing, allowing players to reconnect their bodies and spirits with their breath and shout.

The game is inspired by Lacan's patriarchal order of repression of the original human voice. We can see this theme in many movies or animations. But this game used the power of game to turn the order of the medium upside down, to bring people face to face with a new ontological structure, to cross the symbolic order, and thus to return to their own bodies, to free themselves from spiritual stress.

UI界面操作：短喊=切换按钮，长喊=确认按钮

UI  Operation: short shout = switch button, long shout = confirm button
